frequency.1hrCM: monthly-mean diurnal cycle resolving each day into 1-hour means
frequency.1hrPt: sampled hourly, at specified time point within an hour
frequency.3hrPt: sampled 3 hourly, at specified time point within the time period
frequency.6hrPt: sampled 6 hourly, at specified time point within the time period
frequency.monC: monthly climatology computed from monthly mean samples
frequency.monPt: sampled monthly, at specified time point within the time period
frequency.subhrPt: sampled sub-hourly, at specified time point within an hour
frequency.yrPt: sampled yearly, at specified time point within the time period

grid_label.gn: data reported on a model's native grid
grid_label.gna: data reported on a native grid in the region of Antarctica
grid_label.gng: data reported on a native grid in the region of Greenland
grid_label.gnz: zonal mean data reported on a model's native latitude grid

source_type.gridded_insitu: gridded product based on measurements collected from in-situ instruments
source_type.reanalysis: gridded product generated from a model reanalysis based on in-situ instruments and possibly satellite measurements
source_type.satellite_blended: gridded product based on both in-situ instruments and satellite measurements
source_type.satellite_retrieval: gridded product based on satellite measurements
